mn134:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn134:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:2.1_0: Atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ nigrodhārāmaṁ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tenupasaṅkami;
mn134:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho candano devaputto āyasmantaṁ lomasakaṅgiyaṁ etadavoca:
mn134:2.3_0: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:2.4_0: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn134:2.5_0: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:2.6_0: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:2.7_0: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:2.10_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:2.11_0: “Ekamidaṁ, bhikkhu, samayaṁ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṁsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ.
mn134:2.12_0: Tatra bhagavā devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:4.1_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:4.2_0: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:4.3_0: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:4.4_0: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:4.5_0: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn134:5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tassā rattiyā accayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
mn134:5.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn134:5.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn134:5.3_0: “Ekamidāhaṁ, bhante, samayaṁ sakkesu viharāmi kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:5.4_0: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ nigrodhārāmaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
mn134:5.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhante, so devaputto maṁ etadavoca:
mn134:5.6_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ devaputtaṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn134:5.7_0: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.8_0: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn134:5.9_0: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.10_0: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:5.11_0: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:5.14_0: ‘Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:5.15_0: ‘Ekamidaṁ, bhikkhu, samayaṁ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṁsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ.
mn134:5.16_0: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:5.21_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:5.22_0: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:5.23_0: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:5.24_0: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.25_0: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn134:5.28_0: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn134:6.2_0: “Na kho ahaṁ, bhante, jānāmi taṁ devaputtan”ti.
mn134:6.4_0: Candano, bhikkhu, devaputto aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasikatvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
mn134:6.5_0: Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn134:6.6_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato paccassosi.
mn134:8-13.11_0: evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn134:8-13.12_0: Kathañca, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati …pe…
mn134:8-13.13_0: evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn134:14.18_0: Attamano āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
